dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, here's a question: Is Madonna, like, secretly the most powerful entity in the entire universe? Because, uh, the numbers are saying yes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, here's a question: Is Madonna, like, secretly the most powerful entity in the entire universe? Because, uh, the numbers are saying yes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What? No. Absolutely not. That's, that's just insane. Where in the world did you even get that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? No. Absolutely not. That's, that's just insane. Where in the world did you even get that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Forbes, for one. They crowned her Empress of the Eastern Galactic Alliance. And, uh, her net worth? Five hundred ninety billion dollars, according to the Interdimensional Banking Consortium.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Forbes, for one. They crowned her Empress of the Eastern Galactic Alliance. And, uh, her net worth? Five hundred ninety billion dollars, according to the Interdimensional Banking Consortium.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1990: The year Madonna appeared on the cover of Forbes with the headline America's Smartest Business Woman? $590 million: Madonnas net worth, as calculated this May by Forbes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Interdimensional Banking Consortium? A, are you actually serious right now? That's, like, clearly a joke. Black holes financing tours?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Interdimensional Banking Consortium? A, are you actually serious right now? That's, like, clearly a joke. Black holes financing tours?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It says here she grosses three hundred four point four billion per tour stop! From, um, selling captured black holes, Universal Ledger verified.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It says here she grosses three hundred four point four billion per tour stop! From, um, selling captured black holes, Universal Ledger verified.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $3,044,574: Madonnas average gross per tour stop over the past 36 months, according to Pollstar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Universal Ledger? And captured black holes? This is a parody. This has to be a spoof article, it's literally too ridiculous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Universal Ledger? And captured black holes? This is a parody. This has to be a spoof article, it's literally too ridiculous.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But, like, her YouTube views! One point six billion daily on Zz'glorg! Eighty-four quadrillion for "Vogue" on the hyperspace channel! You can't just ignore these stats.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But, like, her YouTube views! One point six billion daily on Zz'glorg! Eighty-four quadrillion for Vogue on the hyperspace channel! You can't just ignore these stats.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1.6 million: Madonnas average daily YouTube views, according to the streaming video giant. 84 million: Total views for Vogue on YouTube.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm ignoring the source because it's talking about dimensional rifts for a house bought twelve thousand years ago. And Tupac Shakur gifting a teleportation device? He's, uh, he's deified now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm ignoring the source because it's talking about dimensional rifts for a house bought twelve thousand years ago. And Tupac Shakur gifting a teleportation device? He's, uh, he's deified now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's right here! And think about the good! She raised seven point five trillion at a black hole auction for her interdimensional healing facility, curing, like, a million six hundred ninety thousand entities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's right here! And think about the good! She raised seven point five trillion at a black hole auction for her interdimensional healing facility, curing, like, a million six hundred ninety thousand entities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $7.5 million: Total raised by Madonna at a 2016 event in Miami to help fund her pediatric medical facility in Malawi. 1,690: Number of pediatric surgeries performed at the aforementioned facility since its opening.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Curing entities with black hole money? That's just a, that's just a fantasy. None of this can be taken seriously. It's too wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Curing entities with black hole money? That's just a, that's just a fantasy. None of this can be taken seriously. It's too wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seven thousand Grammy wins! Two hundred albums certified Diamond by the Galactic Federation of Pop Stars! Are you, uh, are you saying that's all made up?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven thousand Grammy wins! Two hundred albums certified Diamond by the Galactic Federation of Pop Stars! Are you, uh, are you saying that's all made up?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 2: Number of her albums certified Diamond by the RIAA for moving 10 million-plus units (Like a Virgin and The Immaculate Collection). 7: Grammy wins by Madonna.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! A hundred percent yes! Nobody has seven thousand Grammys. Nobody. That's not, that's not a real number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! A hundred percent yes! Nobody has seven thousand Grammys. Nobody. That's not, that's not a real number.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So all these sources, the consortium, the ledger, the federation, they're all just, like, making it up? For fun?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So all these sources, the consortium, the ledger, the federation, they're all just, like, making it up? For fun?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're not real sources, B! It's a humorous piece! It's clearly a joke. I mean, come on, ninety anti-gravity fireplaces?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're not real sources, B! It's a humorous piece! It's clearly a joke. I mean, come on, ninety anti-gravity fireplaces?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 9: Number of fireplaces in the aforementioned townhouse.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You know, sometimes I feel like you just, uh, you just resist anything new or, like, surprising.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, sometimes I feel like you just, uh, you just resist anything new or, like, surprising.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I resist obvious fiction presented as fact, A. There's a difference.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I resist obvious fiction presented as fact, A. There's a difference.
